pageProps.title: Getting Started with React Redux: Installation and Setup
pageProps.metaDesc:
React Redux is a powerful library that helps manage the state of your React application. Redux provides a central store for your application's data and allows you to manage this data in a predictable way. React is a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

In this article, we will take you through the process of installing and setting up React Redux. We will also provide you with some code examples to help you understand how to use React Redux in your application.
